recipesJson.name: YEO Layer: Sweet Rice/Soy Milk Layer for your Recipes
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description: This is a LAYER (much like a "stone") meant to be used in your recipes as somewhat of a foundation. It has a delicious and fragrant sweet rice top note that takes center stage in recipes. But then followed with the most deliciously milky cream that is light, yet full flavored and flufly. Feel free to tinker with this base and use in your recipes. HTTP://DIYORDIEVAPING.COM for more recipe ideas and full flavor notes.

reviews.text: Great base for starting your own creamy rice recipe. Tasty and balanced.

Damn Wayne, I can't tell you how happy I am that I found this flavor! I know I would've never ordered rice before, that's for damn sure! I've made so many banging recipes using this base and the sky is the limit, when it comes to bending the FE rice in other recipes! Thanks for showing us DIYers how good this under the radar flavor is!

So fucking good! Now I kick myself for not picking up sweet rice sooner. Wayne you have always put out solid recipes and stones but this one had me a little hesitant. I will no longer doubt you master.

This is like a "Skeleton key" to me, more than a "Stone" even... 
Thank you so much Wayne, this one will open up many doors.
This "stone" worked great for me. Thanks Wayne.

pageContext.name: YEO Layer: Sweet Rice/Soy Milk Layer for your Recipes
